025
026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.taglets;
027
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Set;
030
031import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
032
033import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.RawHtml;
034import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
035import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.Utils;
036
037import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
038
039import static jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet.Location.*;
040
041/**
042 * A taglet wrapper, allows the public taglet {@link jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet}
043 * wrapped into an internal {@code Taglet} representation.
044 */
045public final class UserTaglet implements Taglet {
046
047    private final jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet userTaglet;
048
049    public UserTaglet(jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet t) {
050        userTaglet = t;
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public Set<jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet.Location> getAllowedLocations() {
055        return userTaglet.getAllowedLocations();
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public boolean inField() {
060        return userTaglet.getAllowedLocations().contains(FIELD);
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public boolean inConstructor() {
065        return userTaglet.getAllowedLocations().contains(CONSTRUCTOR);
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public boolean inMethod() {
070        return userTaglet.getAllowedLocations().contains(METHOD);
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    public boolean inOverview() {
075        return userTaglet.getAllowedLocations().contains(OVERVIEW);
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public boolean inModule() {
080        return userTaglet.getAllowedLocations().contains(MODULE);
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public boolean inPackage() {
085        return userTaglet.getAllowedLocations().contains(PACKAGE);
086    }
087
088    @Override
089    public boolean inType() {
090        return userTaglet.getAllowedLocations().contains(TYPE);
091    }
092
093    @Override
094    public boolean isInlineTag() {
095        return userTaglet.isInlineTag();
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public boolean isBlockTag() {
100        return userTaglet.isBlockTag();
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public String getName() {
105        return userTaglet.getName();
106    }
107
108    @Override
109    public Content getInlineTagOutput(Element element, DocTree tag,
110            TagletWriter writer) {
111        Content output = writer.getOutputInstance();
112        output.add(RawHtml.of(userTaglet.toString(List.of(tag), element)));
113        return output;
114    }
115
116    @Override
117    public Content getAllBlockTagOutput(Element holder, TagletWriter writer) {
118        Content output = writer.getOutputInstance();
119        Utils utils = writer.configuration().utils;
120        List<? extends DocTree> tags = utils.getBlockTags(holder, this);
121        if (!tags.isEmpty()) {
122            String tagString = userTaglet.toString(tags, holder);
123            if (tagString != null) {
124                output.add(RawHtml.of(tagString));
125            }
126        }
127        return output;
128    }
129}
